article_title: Roche Says FDA Grants Breakthrough Therapy Designation For Venetoclax
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: roche, says, fda, grants, breakthrough, therapy, designation, venetoclax

og.description: Swiss drugmaker Roche said on Thursday that the FDA had granted breakthrough therapy designation for its leukemia drug Venetoclax.
og.title: FDA Designates Leukemia Drug Venetoclax As Breakthrough Therapy
